|- wi(wcel(c0, cgbow), wbr(nat7, cle, c0))
-| diffsc(hs2, c0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW → 7[≤]c0)
⊣ d(hs2, c0)

body.origin: |- diffsc(hs2, c0)

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cgbow), wbr(nat7, cle, c0))
cumulated.pretty: ⊢ (c0 ∈ GoldbachOddW → 7[≤]c0)

comment: Any weak odd Goldbach number is greater than or equal to 7. Because of ~ 7gbow , this bound is strict. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jul-2020.)
